title: General requirements for loans and extensions
context: PART III. LOANS AND EXTENSIONS OF CREDIT §412:9-300 General requirements for loans and extensions of credit. A financial services loan company shall make loans and extensions of credit that are consistent with prudent lending practices, and in compliance with all applicable federal and state laws. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1] Cross References Credit sale contracts, finance charges on, see §476-28. Foreign lender, exclusion, see §207-11. Secured transactions, Uniform Commercial Code, see §490:9-203.
